page.title: 09A DAY IN THE LIFE OF
page.content: {ROGER WILCOCK-CENTRE MANAGER {6.30am}Gets up-has shower,dresses-no breakfast! {7.30}Sets off for work. {8-9}Checks paper work,writes and issues letters to heads of department. {9.05}Examines mail.{11am-1pm }Meeting with personnel.{1pm}Lunch-bacon roll! {2pm}Radio interview with BBC. {3.30 Drives to Inverness for Tourist Board meeting to discuss future development grants.{5.15}Arrives Inverness Airport -departs for Heathrow.{6.20}Arrives at Heathrow.{7.15}Checks into hotel, showers,dresses for dinner.{8.30}Dines with advertising people until {11.15- Retires.
